name: UpdateNotificationTemplate
description:
Update attributes of a notification template.

Use this tool to update an existing notification template's attributes in Datadog's incident management system.

parameters.name: notification_template_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the notification template to update.

value_schema.description: The ID of the notification template.

parameters.name: template_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the notification template to be updated.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the notification template.

parameters.name: notification_template_resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of the notification template resource. Must be 'notification_templates'.

parameters.name: relationships_to_include
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of relationships to include. Valid values: `created_by_user`, `last_modified_by_user`, `incident_type`.

value_schema.description: Comma-separated list of relationships to include. Supported values: `created_by_user`, `last_modified_by_user`, `incident_type`

parameters.name: notification_template_category
parameters.description: The category of the notification template to update.

value_schema.description: The category of the notification template.

parameters.name: notification_template_content
parameters.description: The content body of the notification template to be updated.

value_schema.description: The content body of the notification template.

parameters.name: notification_template_name
parameters.description: The name of the notification template to update in Datadog.

value_schema.description: The name of the notification template.

parameters.name: notification_template_subject
parameters.description: The subject line of the notification template to be updated in Datadog.

value_schema.description: The subject line of the notification template.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of relationships to include. Supported values: `created_by_user`, `last_modified_by_user`, `incident_type`

value_schema.description: Comma-separated list of relationships to include. Supported values: `created_by_user`, `last_modified_by_user`, `incident_type`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the notification template.

value_schema.description: The ID of the notification template.

parameters.name: data.attributes.category
parameters.description: The category of the notification template.

value_schema.description: The category of the notification template.

parameters.name: data.attributes.content
parameters.description: The content body of the notification template.

value_schema.description: The content body of the notification template.

parameters.name: data.attributes.name
parameters.description: The name of the notification template.

value_schema.description: The name of the notification template.

parameters.name: data.attributes.subject
parameters.description: The subject line of the notification template.

value_schema.description: The subject line of the notification template.

parameters.name: data.id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the notification template.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the notification template.
